nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 105: Princess Leia Fights for Her Life! is the one hundred fifth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes Day of the Assassins!, the second black & white part of the story The Weapons Master!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. It wasn't until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic shows its original non-color style.

The comic also includes the fifth part of a brand-new section called Star Profile featuring Anthony Daniels alongside a study-interview of his carrer until 1978 including the soon to-be-released Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
